isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - PRO SLEEPER ELECTRICAL SYSTEM - LIGHTING, ACCESSORIES AND TRAILER SOCKET - POWER SALEM VENT (OPTIONAL)

svcproc.title: POWER SALEM VENT (OPTIONAL)
svcproc.para:
Refer to circuit diagram on
for the following discussion.

The powered Salem vent receives power at all times from B2 battery stud, through cab fuse F-10-B and sleeper fuse 582-B. The vent has a three position switch (HI-LO-OFF) that uses a ten ohm resistor to reduce voltage to the switch in the low mode. The vent motor ground path is through the sleeper and cab harness to cab ground adapter (454).
